resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105766</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105766</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Constitution Day Resources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschaffenheit-Tagesbetriebsmittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources de Jour de Constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos Do Dia Do Constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse Di Giorno Di Costituzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς ημέρας συνταγμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos Del Día De la Constitución</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features primary documents, lesson plans, and stories for kids. Stories tell about the Articles of Confederation, James Madison's contribution to the Constitution, the adoption of the Bill of Rights, the 14th Amendment, the 19th Amendment (women's suffrage), and the 24th Amendment (ending the poll tax).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet Primärdokumente, Lektionpläne und 
Geschichten für Zicklein. Geschichten erklären über die 
Artikel des Bündnis-, Jamesmadisons Beitrags zur Beschaffenheit, der 
Annahme der Verfassung, der 14. Änderung, der 19. Änderung 
(Stimmrecht der Frauen) und der 24. Änderung (die Gemeindeabgabe 
beendend).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte les documents, les plans de leçon, et 
les histoires primaires pour des gosses. Les histoires indiquent
au sujet des articles de la confédération, de la contribution de 
James Madison à la constitution, de l'adoption de la 
déclaration des droits, du 14ème amendement, du 19ème amendement 
(le suffrage des femmes), et du 24ème amendement (terminant l'impôt 
local).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza originais, plantas da lição, e 
histórias preliminares para miúdos. As histórias dizem sobre 
os artigos da contribuição do confederation, do James Madison ao 
constitution, do adoption da conta de direitas, da 1â emenda, da 19a 
emenda (suffrage das mulheres), e da 2â emenda (que termina o imposto
de votação).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza i documenti, i programmi di lezione e
le storia primari per i capretti. Le storia dicono a circa gli 
articoli del contributo di James, di confederazione Madison alla 
costituzione, dell'approvazione della fattura dei diritti, della 
quattordicesima correzione, della diciannovesima correzione (suffrage 
delle donne) e della ventiquattresima correzione (che conclude la 
tassa di scrutinio).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχικά έγγραφα χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων, σχέδια 
μαθήματος, και ιστορίες για τα κατσίκια. Οι ιστορίες λένε 
για τα άρθρα της συνομοσπονδίας, james Μάντισον συμβολή στο 
σύνταγμα, την υιοθέτηση του Bill των δικαιωμάτων, τη 14$η 
τροποποίηση, τη 19$η τροποποίηση (ψήφος των γυναικών), και τη 24$η
τροποποίηση (που τελειώνει τον κεφαλικό φόρο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece documentos, planes de la lección, y las 
historias primarios para los cabritos. Las historias hablan de 
los artículos de la contribución de la confederación, de James 
Madison a la constitución, de la adopción de la cuenta de las 
derechas, de la 14ta enmienda, de la diecinueveavo enmienda (sufragio 
de las mujeres), y de la 24ta enmienda (que termina el impuesto de 
encuesta).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105766</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/constitution-day-resources</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
